install.title: Welcome to the Go+ installation with InGop
install.desc: Go+ programming language For engineering, STEM education, and data science

success.tips: Installation complete, going to admin page ...

error.network: Network error, please check your network connection and try again.
error.version: Golang version must be greater than or equal to 1.16, Please uninstall your Golang yourself and click Retry afterwards, InGop will automatically install the appropriate environment for you.
error.ingop: Your current Go+ was not installed by InGop and is not managed by InGop, so if you need to use InGop, please uninstall your current Go+ and click Retry.

ingop.go: Detecting that your Golang is not installed on InGop, it is recommended that you uninstall Golang yourself and click Retry, leaving all environments for InGop to install (not required).

reboot.tip: Ingop has installed Go+ for you and set up the environment variables you need for your system, if you need them to take effect immediately, please reboot your computer!

update.title: Update
update.desc: Update Go+ to the latest version

tips.title: Warm Tips
tips.update: Below is the updated information, are you sure you want to update?
tips.re: A reinstall will solve and fix some of the problems, but it may affect some of your settings, are you sure you want to reinstall?
tips.un: This will uninstall everything you have installed using InGop, are you sure you want to uninstall it?
